column1: This Judgment is pertaining to the Applications bearing Nos. Writ-163-21
& Writ-288-21. The Ceylon Electricity Board Technological Engineers and
Petitioners are the President and the General Secretary of the 1st Petitioner
Union.  The Petitioners in these applications have invoked the supervisory
jurisdiction  of  this  Court  under  Article  140  of  the  Constitution  seeking,
